router._help: This module provides deterministic code blobs and checksum hashes.

code._help: Returns an lzma compressed deterministic blob (client side code).

_ref._this: Provide a `$MODE` to get the corresponding deterministic blob.

hash._help: Returns the DJB2 checksum hash of a deterministic blob.

_ref._this: Provide a `$MODE` to get a DJB2 hash.

router.hashes: Returns the DJB2 checksum hashes of all deterministic blobs.
